nodes.text: Wedding of Corran Horn and Mirax Terrik

The Wedding of Corran Horn and Mirax Terrik was a secret ceremony that took place in 7 ABY, on the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Lusankya. It was officiated by Wedge Antilles who was acting as de facto captain of the recently captured ship. The wedding was witnessed by Tycho Celchu and Iella Wessiri. The Horns planned to have a more formal wedding back on Coruscant.
